text: Ephemeroidea is a superfamily of mayflies. Members of this superfamily are found in most parts of the world with the exception of the Arctic, the Antarctic and Australia. The following families are recognised: *Behningiidae *Ephemeridae *Euthyplociidae *Palingeniidae *Polymitarcyidae *Potamanthidae ==References== Category:Mayflies
title: Ephemeroidea
